climbs.name: Wake-n-Bake
climbs.fa: FA Preston Ferris, Bolt and prepped by Alan Collins and Preston Ferris

content.description: Clip a low bolt to protect a committing move getting onto the wall. Figure out how to use awkward holds until the climbing eases up by the last bolt.
content.protection: 5 bolts. Fixed steel carabiners at anchors.
content.location: Furthest right route on the wall. Starts next to a dihedral crack on a ledge.

climbs.name: Shalom
climbs.fa: FA, Bolted and Prepped by Kent Vogal

content.description: Possibly the best route on the wall. Shares the start with munchies, clipping the first bolt. Branch out right into more technical terrain with thoughtful movement.
content.location: 2nd most left route on the wall. Share first bolt with munchies.

climbs.name: Munchies
climbs.fa: FA, Bolted and Prepped by Alex Reed

content.description: Climb around a vertical bulge at the start and clip the 2nd bolt from atop the bulge. Continue trending up and left. Crux comes getting to the 3rd bolt
content.protection: 6 bolts and steel carabiners at anchors.
content.location: Most left route on the wall

climbs.name: Indo Smoke
climbs.fa: Fa Haylee Wray, Bolted and Prepped by Nick Ahnen

content.description: Start just under a ledge and travese onto the wall. Make a couple moves to the first bolt. Methodical climbing continues all the awl up once the 1st bolts is clipped. Not physical if don't properly, just really foot intensive.
content.protection: 5 bolts and steel carabiner on anchors.
content.location: 2nd most right route on the wall.

content.description: The name of the wall says it all! A handful of easy climbs to get warmed up for the harder ones, or just for a chill day away from the crowds for beginner climbers. The wall never gets vert, although it feels like it at times. 4 slabby routes ranging from 5.8 to 5.10a lead all to independent anchors. Once all the lichen gets trafficked off the wall, these climbs will be a great place fore beginner climbers to get some mileage. Gets shade almost all day but the early morning.
